description: Bitcoin Lightning Network wallet management via Voltage API - enables AI agents to create, manage, and monitor Lightning wallets with full TypeScript support
toolDescription: Manages Bitcoin Lightning Network wallets through Voltage API. Can create new wallets, retrieve wallet information, check balances, and delete wallets. Fully typed with TypeScript for better AI agent integration.

inputParameters.name: resource
inputParameters.description: The type of resource to operate on

inputParameters.name: operation
inputParameters.description: The operation to perform on the resource

inputParameters.name: walletId
inputParameters.description: The specific wallet ID (required for get and delete operations)

inputParameters.name: walletDetails
inputParameters.description: JSON object with wallet configuration for creation

outputDescription: Returns wallet information, creation confirmation, or operation status depending on the operation performed
useCases: Create Lightning wallets for different purposes or projects
Manage multiple Lightning wallets in an organization
Clean up unused or test wallets
whenToUse: When you need to manage Bitcoin Lightning Network wallets programmatically, create wallets for AI agent operations, or integrate Lightning wallet functionality into automated workflows.
